医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
短链脂肪酸丙酸和丁酸直接修饰染色质调节基因表达短链脂肪酸影响基因调控和染色质可及性，突出了它们在结直肠癌和正常细胞过程中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Short-chain-fatty-acids-propionate-and-butyrate-directly-modify-chromatin-to-regulate-gene-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Short-chain-fatty-acids-propionate-and-butyrate-directly-modify-chromatin-to-regulate-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5de9d5b1-448a-48a3-a4af-6d7c82d81ee1 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 04:51:00 -0500 Short-chain fatty acids propionate and butyrate directly modify chromatin to regulate gene expression
睡眠不足会扰乱快速眼动睡眠，从而引发侵入性记忆睡眠不足会影响大脑的记忆控制，而快速眼动睡眠对于有效抑制侵入性记忆和认知功能至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Sleep-loss-triggers-intrusive-memories-by-disrupting-REM-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Sleep-loss-triggers-intrusive-memories-by-disrupting-REM-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14fce2ca-7288-4a99-a488-45f85b9a2c5b Mon, 13 Jan 2025 04:00:00 -0500 Sleep loss triggers intrusive memories by disrupting REM sleep
离子过氧化氢 (iHP) 在现代消毒中的兴起了解电离过氧化氢消毒的好处。 Jim Reynolds 分享了有关其应用及其对行业标准影响的专家见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-Rise-of-Ionized-Hydrogen-Peroxy-(iHP)-in-Modern-Disinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-Rise-of-Ionized-Hydrogen-Peroxy-(iHP)-in-Modern-Disinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed84563c-cad3-4bb9-bb71-af5ef88926a1 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 03:29:00 -0500 The Rise of Ionized Hydrogen Peroxide (iHP) in Modern Disinfection
波士顿科学公司宣布同意收购 Bolt Medical, Inc.波士顿科学公司 (Boston Scientific Corporation) 今天宣布，已达成收购 Bolt Medical, Inc. 的最终协议，Bolt Medical, Inc. 是用于治疗冠状动脉和外周动脉疾病的血管内碎石 (IVL) 先进激光平台的开发商。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Boston-Scientific-announces-agreement-to-acquire-Bolt-Medical-Inc.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Boston-Scientific-announces-agreement-to-acquire-Bolt-Medical-Inc.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d911f7bb-6689-456c-8b10-d09fe19cc502 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 03:13:00 -0500 Boston Scientific announces agreement to acquire Bolt Medical, Inc.
研究揭示为何今天的 H5N1 流感病例没有历史爆发的严重程度研究表明，当代 HPAI H5N1 病毒在人肺类器官中的复制和免疫激活减少，这可能解释了与历史毒株相比，人类疾病较轻的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-why-H5N1-flu-cases-today-are-less-severe-than-historic-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-why-H5N1-flu-cases-today-are-less-severe-than-historic-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1740ea9-48f9-43ef-9b7b-6c3c9708f4ad Mon, 13 Jan 2025 00:26:00 -0500 Study reveals why H5N1 flu cases today are less severe than historic outbreaks
社交媒体引发全球不满，青少年面临身体形象危机研究调查了六个国家年轻人对身体的不满，揭示了与社交媒体使用和社会人口统计数据的密切联系，强调了全球干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Teens-face-body-image-crisis-as-social-media-fuels-dissatisfaction-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Teens-face-body-image-crisis-as-social-media-fuels-dissatisfaction-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=707894c1-dac0-465b-b933-ec6567dc69a5 Sun, 12 Jan 2025 23:55:00 -0500 Teens face body image crisis as social media fuels dissatisfaction globally
过度加工食品导致死亡风险飙升——简单的饮食改变可以有所帮助食用超加工食品会增加死亡风险，特别是循环系统疾病、消化系统疾病和帕金森病，但替代最低加工食品可以降低这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Mortality-risks-soar-with-ultra-processed-foods-simple-diet-changes-can-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Mortality-risks-soar-with-ultra-processed-foods-simple-diet-changes-can-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb9470f3-4e80-4fa6-be81-fe33833a376d Sun, 12 Jan 2025 23:24:00 -0500 Mortality risks soar with ultra-processed foods - simple diet changes can help
研究表明，对于长期健康而言，健康比体重更重要无论体重指数如何，心肺健康都能显着降低死亡风险，这凸显了健康是减肥策略的关键健康决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Being-fit-matters-more-than-weight-for-long-term-health-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Being-fit-matters-more-than-weight-for-long-term-health-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7800184-02c4-4105-82e3-a689ffb80a1c Sun, 12 Jan 2025 22:26:00 -0500 Being fit matters more than weight for long-term health, research shows
完全植入式人工耳蜗有望开启听力恢复新时代科学家们开发出了一种完全植入式人工耳蜗，其听力性能可与传统设备相媲美，同时提高生活质量并消除对外部组件的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Totally-implantable-cochlear-implant-promises-a-new-era-of-hearing-restoration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250112/Totally-implantable-cochlear-implant-promises-a-new-era-of-hearing-restoration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c6a9527-4c68-40f3-8ba4-2bebbdc1cc7c Sun, 12 Jan 2025 17:31:00 -0500 Totally implantable cochlear implant promises a new era of hearing restoration
老师捐肝挽救前学生生命当来自纽约州奥尔登的 5 岁男孩 Ezra Toczek 面临进行性肝病并发症时，他的前日托老师 Carissa Fisher 成为了意想不到的英雄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250111/Teacher-donates-liver-to-save-former-students-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250111/Teacher-donates-liver-to-save-former-students-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0590486-c4b4-4aab-80e8-f50b1c87177f Sat, 11 Jan 2025 00:14:00 -0500 Teacher donates liver to save former student's life
